meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6661.

td.p: Erin Wenokur, a 12-year-old seventh grader from Lafayette, California
Jonathan Shoemaker, an 11-year-old sixth grader from Austin, Texas
Zoë Assasie, an 11-year-old fifth grader from Urbana, Maryland

tr.td: KIDS THESE DAYS
SPORTS STUFF
BIBLICAL PEOPLE
SCREENS
CANDY IS DANDY
PARTS OF SPEECH
